data.title: B Spawn to B Site Post Molly
data.description: This lineup allows you to send a Molly onto B site post plant.

data.title: Full B Site Sky Smoke Exec
data.description: Use these Sky Smoke placements to close off sight lines to B Site enabling a push to the left.

data.title: Full A Site Sky Smoke Exec
data.description: Sky Smoke allows you to close sight lines between Pyramids allowing for an aggressive push to the right side of A.

data.title: A Site Default Sky Smokes
data.description: A good set of Sky Smokes to take control of A Site.

data.title: B Site Default Smokes
data.description: Some good smokes to take B Site with.

data.title: Mid Cannon to Front B Site Incendiary
data.description: This is a good Incendiary for post plant on A Site from Mid Cannon.

data.title: A Lobby to A Right Pyramid Incendiary
data.description: This is a good incendiary grenade for A Right Pyramid to stop the defuse of a bomb.
